application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: G1 -Irish Yew (Taxus baccata fastigiata)	Fell to ground level and grub out stumps. X6 trees. T2 - Silver Birch (Betula pendula)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2m, to tidy and contain. Final height 8m and spread 4m.T3 - Narrowleaf Firethorn (Pyracantha angustifolia)	Fell to ground level and remove all arisingsT4 - Bamboo (Chusquea quila)	Trim top of Bamboo down to height of top window sill.T5 - Olive (Olea europaea)	Reduce overextended spires down by approximately 1.5-2m to back within the natural line of the tree to create a tidy natural looking shape. T6 - Leyland cypress (Cuprocyparis leylandii)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 3-4m, while still maintaining live growth, to contain and tidy. Final height 8m and spread 4m.T7	Yew (Taxus baccata)	Fell to ground level and remove all arisingsT8	Bay (Laurus nobilis)	Fell to ground level and remove all arisings
